request.description:
BRD : Techserve4u admin should be able to register company from admin panel

SE: Shiblu Ahmad
PO: Pranto Mazumder
QA: Mohammad Chowdhury        
Reviewer:Fuad Ahmed 

Objective:

As a techserve4u admin, I want to create a new company from the admin panel so that they can use our services.
        
Acceptance Criteria:
I should be able to register the company with their information.
Register company webpage contains the information:
Company Name
Company Address
Company Agreement File
Verification File
Company TIN Number
Services

Dependency:
The registered techserve4u admin should be able to log
in to the admin panel.
Test Data : 
{
    "name": "Roni chy",
    "address": " 12050 mcdougall MI",
    "tin": "262661"
}
Expected Result:
{
    "data": {
        "company_address": "12050 mcdougall MI",
        "company_id": 761,
        "company_name": "Roni chy",
        "tin": "262661"
    },
    "message": "Successfully registered company 'Chowdhury   Company'.",
    "status": "success"
}
Actual Result : 

{
    "data": {
        "company_address": "12050 mcdougall,MI",
        "company_id": 761,
        "company_name": "Roni Chy",
        "tin": "262661"
    },
    "message": "Successfully registered company 'Chowdhury   Company'.",
    "status": "success"
}
Status code : 201
Test Result : Passed

request.description:
BRD : Techserve4u admin should be able to register company admin
 SE: Shiblu Ahmad 
 PO: Pranto Mazumder
 QA: Mohammad Chowdhury
 Reviewer:Fuad Ahmed

Objective:

        As a techserve4u admin, I want to register company
        admin from the admin panel so that the admin can log 
        in to the web admin panel and can manage the company.
    
    
         
Acceptance Criteria:
I should be able to register the company admin for a particular company.
Register company admin webpage should contain this information:
First Name
last name
username
Email
password
create and cancel button

Dependency:
The registered super admin should be login to the admin panel.
 
Teat Data : 
{
 "email": "ronichy@email.com",
 "password": "Roni1111",
 "username": "Roni_chy",
 "firstname": "Roni",
 "lastname": "chy",
 "company_id": 761,
 "member_type": 2
}
Expected Result:
{
    
    "message": "Successfully registered dashboard user Roni-Chy.",
    "status": "success"
}
 
Actual Result : 
{
    
    "message": "Successfully registered dashboard user Roni-Chy.",
    "status": "success"
}
 
Status code:400
Test result:passed

Objective:

        As a company admin, I want to create a new user for mobile App (FFM) from the admin panel so that I can assign action items to them.

       
         
Acceptance Criteria:
I should be able to register users through their information
"Add User" web page contains some information like:
First Name
last Name
Phone Number
Department
Designation
NID

}

SE: Shiblu Ahmad

QA: Mohammad Chowdhury
Reviewer:Fuad Ahmed

Objective:
As an App user,I Want to login to the FFM app that I can avail services available to me       

Acceptance Criteria:        
I should be able to log in on the FFM mobile app through
my registered contact number
I will get an OTP code to verify my number

Dependency:
Users should be registered from the company admin panel.

"phone_number": "3136522464",
"firebase_id": "firebase_ididid",
"secret_text": "the_super_secret_text",
"phone_number_int": "3136522464",
"iso_code": "US"

}
Expected Result:
 {
    
    "message": "Successfully logged in.",
    "status": "success"
} 
Actual Result : 
{
    
    "message": "Successfully logged in.",
    "status": "success"
}
status code:200 Ok
Test result:passed

request.description:
BRD : Dashboard User (Techserve/Company admin) login in admin panel

SE: Shiblu Ahmad
PO: Pranto Mazumder
QA: Mohammad Chowdhury
Reviewer:Fuad Ahmed

Objective:
         As a techserve4u/company admin, I want to login to the admin so that I can avail services available according to my member type
        
Acceptance Criteria:        
     I will get my login credentials from my super admin.
     if I want to login as a techserve4u admin then I have to register on techserve4u panel or if I want to login as a company admin then i have to register on company panel.
       
     
 Dependency:
 Register Dashboard User should be able to log in to the admin panel 
      
Test Data : 
{
 "email": "ronichy@email.com",
 "password": "Roni1111"

}
Expected Result:
 {
    
    "message": "Successfully logged in.",
    "status": "success"
}

Actual Result : 
{
    
    "message": "Successfully logged in.",
    "status": "success"
}
status code:200 Ok
Test result:passed

objective: As an App user,I want to get the company contact
(user and Admin)list so that I can see the whole company contact list.
             
Acceptance Criteria :
on the FFM app, I can get all the contact information of other company employees,
From there I can call and send then message on their mobile through the FFM app

 credentials.

      }

  ]

Actual list:

        "designation": null,
        "email":"ronichy@email.com",
        "name":"Roni chy",
        "phone_number":"",
        "profile_photo":""
      }

  ] 
status code:200
Test result:passed

that I can see the whole company user list
       
      

Acceptance Criteria:
I should be able to view all the user list on the web panel.
I should be able to register more users,edit their information as well as delete a user from the company.

Dependency:
Registered company admin should be able to log in through valid credentials.

Test data:

BRD:App user should be able to authenticate

SE: Shiblu Ahmad
PO: Pranto Mazumder
QA: Mohammad Chowdhury
Reviewer:Fuad Ahmed

objective: As an App user,I want to see my information is authenticated or not so that I can be sure that my id information is authenticated.   


Acceptance Criteria:
As a tester, I can check the app user information through my API token on the postman.
I can't check this through the FFM App.
It will check my information from the backend on every one hour.

Dependency:
Registered FFM app users should be able to login with valid credentials.

Test data:
Bearer token from app user login

Expected result:
{
    "data": 379,
    "status": "success"
}


Actual Test:
{
    "data": 379,
    "status": "success"
}
 
status code:200
Test result:passed

BRD:Techserve/company admin and FFM app user should be able to  refresh their authentication token

SE: Shiblu Ahmad
PO: Pranto Mazumder
QA: Mohammad Chowdhury
Reviewer:Fuad Ahmed

objective: As Techserve4u/company admin and FFM app user,I
want to get a new token from Api so that I can use the new token.
       
      

Acceptance Criteria:
.It will happen automatically from the back-end
.This Api will validate the information
Dependency:
The registered user should be login to the App

Test data:
Bearer token from app user login

Expected result:
{
     "message": "Successfully refreshed token.",
    "status": "success"
}


Actual Test:
{
     "message": "Successfully refreshed token.",
    "status": "success"
}

 
status code:200
Test result:passed
